title: ‘Pogačar Raised the Bar, We Need to Close the Gap’: Visma Won’t Deny Vingegaard’s Tour de France Problem
content:
Visma-Lease a Bike bullish Vingegaard can return to top of grand tour hierarchy, but accepts it won't be easy: 'We need to step up in all areas.'

Read the full article at ‘Pogačar Raised the Bar, We Need to Close the Gap’: Visma Won’t Deny Vingegaard’s Tour de France Problem on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
